text: Keith Howlett is a retired British boxer. ==Boxing career== Howlett was twice National Champion when boxing for the Army. In 1988 and 1989 he won the prestigious ABA bantamweight championship. He represented England in the -54 kg bantamweight division, at the 1990 Commonwealth Games in Auckland, New Zealand. ==References== Category:Living people Category:British male boxers Category:Boxers at the 1990 Commonwealth Games Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Bantamweight boxers
title: Keith Howlett
